level.heading: APPLICATION FOR CERTIFIED BUSINESS ENTERPRISE STATUS (§ 27-801)

level.text: 801.1 An applicant for certification with the Department shall submit aompleted application that is signed and sworn to by the applicant, settingorth the basis for certification as a CBE, accompanied by documentationequested by the Department.

801.3 An applicant may also be required to demonstrate compliance with theequirements of the Act, this chapter, and other laws of the District ofolumbia. In furtherance of such demonstration, the applicant shall:
